comment: He is particular about how he wants the papers written and will help you as much as he can. He likes to give pop quizzes with only three questions, so make sure you know the reading, and if you are not in class to take the pop quiz, it is an automatic zero if you go to class and write the papers, well it's an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Such a fun professor! Put so much effort into his lectures and assignments & helping you understand. The grading was very fair & sets you up for success! Also hilarious and very caring. He created Youtube videos explaining the concepts and gave some easy extra credit!

Professor Bostian has been one of the best professors I have ever had. He is a very reasonable grader, gives bonus opportunities, and keeps class interesting. Despite a difficult, Coronavirus-filled semester, this class was the one class I enjoyed among many others. If you have the opportunity, definitely take one of his classes.

BEST PROFESSOR EVER. He is a grad student so he understands how boring the course is, he makes the class fun. He is so funny and respectable and very honest which intimidates some people, but he is genuinely so nice. He communicates well and the instructions for all assignments are clear. He wants you to pass so do the work and you definitely will!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: Super cool and funny. Made youtube videos when covid happened that were very entertaining. He is very down to earth. Can be intimidating at first, but he's pretty cool if u need help. Anytime he assigns a reading, read it because there's usually a quiz on it the next day. Hybrid class is really easy.

Professor Bostain was nothing short of amazing. Class was also straight to the point. The deadlines and requirements were always made clear and being a student himself he clearly understood us undergrad students. I would most definitely take him again.

Professor Bostian is an overall awesome guy. He's probably the funniest professor I've ever came across. He sets clear guidelines for papers and assignments so if you follow the rubric, you can legit make 100% on every assignment. He's very understanding, as well and cares about the overall health of his students (mental, physical, etc.).

Perfect 1102 teacher. Criteria is basic and he lets you know up front what too expect. He is also a student teacher so he will work with you as long as you work with him. This is one class you would not have to stress getting work down. One big paper that he guides you through and the rest is easy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Bostian is the goat, he cares about his students enough to let things slide and he make lectures and class fun to be apart. I had him for a 9am but I still woke up and went because he was that good. If you take him trust me you'll love him.
Having him as a first year student was amazing. His class fun to be in. If you do your papers you will make an A in the class. I am actually taking him for my ENGL 1102 class. TAKE HIM!!

Awesome professor. Funny, organized, knows what he is talking about, and is super accessible. Will do anything to make sure you get it and pass well if you put the work in (which isn't much). Take. Him.

Sarcastic, fun, and KSU grad student so he understands if you miss class sometimes. Listen and you'll get a good grade. He likes you if you pay attention. I got an 97 on both of the papers we've done so far. Not a hard grader, sometimes you read a page or 2 of the book, and occasional 3 question pop quizzes (super easy). Taking him again in spring.
